## Environment
```{r Environment, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
source(file = "utility/environments.R")
source(file = "utility/helper_functions.R")

fn.prefix <- "survex-01_"
# icon.grob <- png_to_grob()
```


# Create a Model and an Explainer
```{r}
model <- ranger(Surv(time, status) ~ ., data = veteran)

explainer <- survex::explain(model, 
                             data = veteran[, -c(3, 4)], 
                             y = Surv(veteran$time, veteran$status))
```


# evaluate the model
```{r}
model_performance(explainer)
```


# visualize permutation-based feature importance
```{r}
model.pfi <- model_parts(explainer)
model.pfi.df <- model.pfi$result
plot(model.pfi)
ggsave(paste0("fig/", fn.prefix, "pfi.jpg"), width = 5, height = 4, dpi = 300)
```


# explain one prediction with SurvSHAP(t)
```{r}
plot(predict_parts(explainer, veteran[1, -c(3, 4)]))
```
